$type? {}{WWWOFFLE Index - Main Index} $type?=outgoing{WWWOFFLE Index - Outgoing Requests}{} $type?=monitor {WWWOFFLE Index - Monitored Pages}{} $type?=lasttime{WWWOFFLE Index - Last Time Online Pages}{} $type?=prevtime{WWWOFFLE Index - Previous Time Online Pages ($subtype)}{} $type?=lastout {WWWOFFLE Index - Last Time Outgoing Pages}{} $type?=prevout {WWWOFFLE Index - Previous Time Outgoing Pages ($subtype)}{} $type?=http {WWWOFFLE Index - $type://$subtype}{} $type?=https {WWWOFFLE Index - $type://$subtype}{} $type?=ftp {WWWOFFLE Index - $type://$subtype}{} $type?=finger {WWWOFFLE Index - $type://$subtype}{} $typesubtype=$type$subtype $type?=prevtime{$type=$type$subtype $subtype=}{} $type?=prevout{$type=$type$subtype $subtype=}{} $typesubtype?=http{$type=$type/}{} $typesubtype?=https{$type=$type/}{} $typesubtype?=ftp{$type=$type/}{} $typesubtype?=finger{$type=$type/}{} $subtype?{$subtype=/$subtype}{}
WWWOFFLE - World Wide Web Offline Explorer - v$version

WWWOFFLE Cache Index
